teaser.jcr:description: Update your contact details, preferences, and login details. If any other details require updating, please contact us on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET

addressdetails.residentialAddressSubTitle: Mailing address is same as residential address

emailaddress.introductoryText: Please select which email you prefer as your login and contact email. Your login email will also be used for Two-Factor Authentication.
emailaddress.loginEmailDescription: You must set your login email before proceeding
emailaddress.preferredContactDescription: Please select your preferred contact email which will be used for all correspondence
emailaddress.thankYouDescription: Your email address has been updated
emailaddress.verifyEmailDescription: You should have just received an email containing a one time password (OTP). Please verify your account by entering the OTP code below.
emailaddress.verifyEmailDisclaimer: Still haven’t received your OTP code? Please contact our customer service team on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.
emailaddress.verifyEmailResendText: You can resend the email in {timer} seconds
emailaddress.verifyMobileDescription: You should have just received an SMS containing a one time password (OTP) to the mobile associated with your account. Please verify your account by entering the SMS OTP code below.
emailaddress.verifyMobileDisclaimer: Still haven’t received your OTP code? Please contact our customer service team on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.
emailaddress.verifyMobileResendText: You can resend the SMS in {timer} seconds

phonenumber_1692803503.preferredContactDescription: Please select your preferred contact number
phonenumber_1692803503.thankYouDescription: Your phone number has been updated
phonenumber_1692803503.verifyEmailDescription: You should have just received an email containing a one time password (OTP). Please verify your account by entering the OTP code below.
phonenumber_1692803503.verifyEmailDisclaimer: Still haven’t received your OTP code? Please contact our customer service team on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.
phonenumber_1692803503.verifyEmailResendText: You can resend the email in {timer} seconds
phonenumber_1692803503.verifyMobileDescription: You should have just received an SMS containing a one time password (OTP) to the mobile associated with your account. Please verify your account by entering the SMS OTP code below.
phonenumber_1692803503.verifyMobileDisclaimer: Still haven’t received your OTP code? Please contact our customer service team on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.
phonenumber_1692803503.verifyMobileResendText: You can resend the SMS in {timer} seconds

managepassword.managePasswordDescription:
Your password must be at least 8 characters in length and different to previously used passwords.

It must meet at least 3 of the 4 conditions listed below:

  • At least 1 UPPER CASE letter (A-Z)
  • At least 1 lower case letter (a-z)
  • At least 1 number (0-9)
  • At least 1 special character e.g. (@,#,$,%,&, ?)
managepassword.verifyMobileDescription: You should have just received an SMS containing a one time password (OTP) to the mobile associated with your account. Please verify your account by entering the SMS OTP code below.
managepassword.verifyMobileDisclaimer: Still haven’t received your OTP code? Please contact our customer service team on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.
managepassword.verifyMobileResendText: You can resend the SMS in {timer} seconds

marketingandcommunic.correspondenceMethodDescription: My chosen method of correspondence to receive notices and other documents from <brand> is via Email. I acknowledge that I can change or cancel my nominated email address, in writing, at any time.
marketingandcommunic.marketingCommunicationsErrorDescription: Please try again or contact our customer service team on 137 200 Mon-Fri 8.30am - 7.00pm AET.
marketingandcommunic.marketingCommunicationsErrorTitle: Sorry, we are experiencing a problem.
marketingandcommunic.marketingPreferenceDescription: I would like to be informed about the latest products and services, special offers, promotions and events.
marketingandcommunic.thankYouDescription: Your marketing and communications preferences have been updated
